body:
Dang this was very well done. I find it interesting the implications of the person who was running away mid breakdown at the beginning. Its likely that man had used the medals as well, however it worked on EVERYONE, meaning nobody cared about him. As reality crashed down on him he had a nervous breakdown.
Probably the most interesting Mindcontrol concept I've seen. 208501
can anyone explain the plot and the story?
Inspired by Adam Sandler's Click....?
that extra ending is tied to ashiomi masato's other work, loveless labyrinth jsyk
pog pog pog pog pog skip pog pog
The MC learned that he can't do whatever he wants without a cost, nice history
Surprisingly nice story and i didn't even fapped to it, I got genuinely curious to what would happen next. Masterpiece
Ngl, the story is interesting. And it's a first that I see that you learn a lesson and not get a bad ending from it. 5/5

Recommend this author to anyone who's new.
Also you should read Loveless Labyrinth first then this one to understand the last part.
Sh*t, I should've blitz fapped before I reached act 2. Now I'm too hooked on the story.
Bro, this shit is a masterpiece👏🏽👏🏽👏🏽 10/10. Came here to fap, but I was in my feelings. Absolutely amazing. MILF teachers were sexy. Especially the thicc blonde MILF😍😍😍😋😋  👌🏽👌🏽👌🏽

This was the first doujin/hentai (other than Nozoki Ana which I had no idea was a hentai) that I've read, not to fap, but to genuinely enjoy the story. It was really darn interesting. I honestly didn't care about the gangbang and ugly bastard because the story was that god damn intriguing.

1-166
The story was good

A classic. Honestly MC was such a complete piece of shit at first that I found it refreshing. Instead of cucking out, he was telling the girl, Mashiro, to get off his ass if she's not going to let him get on hers. Totally reasonable, until you realize that from the first few panels even before he uses the medals, if he had just put THE SLIGHTEST EFFORT, Mashiro would have been completely willing to have sex with him as much as he wanted. All he needed was to actually listen to what she was saying but he was too arrogant and selfish for that. That is the plot of an ungrateful, prideful man that acted without thinking, leading to disastrous consequences and almost losing what he loved the most. Great art, great sex, actual character development although best girl didn't win. Momoka Arisue besto  grill 10/10
Very interesting plot, felt like I was reading a Manga of some sorts
This hentai has a whole redemption ARC, like wow. Definite favorite!

what the fuck this was so good, the plot was  incredible suspenseful & dramatic with an ending & story line that taught a lesson to the reader(read the story in full to understand the lesson). this should be made into an actual high quality hentai. I wish I could buy this book (though I know my mom probs would never buy me hentai).
what's with that extra? can't really grasp it. what's the power of the pendant and who is that old lady
Fuck i went through it too fast and thout that the other guy in his body defended and fuck Mashiro, if not for the comments i would've have realized the happy ending
I love that this almost had me convinced that the teacher would manage to fuck Mashiro before Aki's realization and getting his original body back. 10/10

remember, never search a hentai with a fucking dramarical good plot (duh for a hentai) and for people who didn't understand the story, you are stupid,  in general the story tells about a guy who didn’t appreciate his girlfriend properly and when he finds himself close to losing her
by the curse of the medals, history itself shows that he learned his lesson, and manages to return to his original body and  and save your girlfriend.
i cried on this shit, fucking good
the constant vibe of ntr the author give was annoying . in fact im confused.. other guys had medals or not? in one panel there is a random guy holding a  medal in front of MC gf
god damn it why this shit so good
Came for the faps, stayed for the plot, faved for the feels, commented to thank the guy below and his clever theory/explanation of the story
why isnt there an anime adaptation???
Wow, nice hypothesis p0209... I (somewhat) understood that & makes a bit of sense.

poster.username: I-it's not like I like you....

body: Batshit crazy story that makes no fucking sense, but good art tho

In conclusion: every time using the medal, main was having a 'super magic happy time', none of the person the medals were used on were even affected, really. See: the extra, just with a pendant instead of medal, and unless main in that cummed into the dolls...

And, well. Everything long story arc drawn by this guy is ultimately linked back to the magical love shop of the witch girl on final page - and on every story the effect was only magical, mostly not real, and only have the effects on the owner/active user of the artifact.

That and, B, the 'gender bender' never shows up on camera/film even if filmed, and C, they 'stealth' whenever someone walks by. So, just a big-big illusion. Might have something to do with the final part even - like a... 'prequel'/explanation: all is up to the user, the artifacts only give a... suitable nudge.

Going by the logic, seems like all the medal do is giving a... very real illusion, almost witch-like in nature.  None of the girls the main slept around with remember him, and no one objects when he reveals he was 'pure' and 'innocent'.
plot's good
This is what I needed to cleanse my soul of the NTR toxins that'd be plaguing me. Thank you  thank you

Just so you know the last story is from Loveless Labyrinth another of this artist's gems and another in the Casquette Girl's  story. Though there's no story she's been a running character in many of his works.
I love it

and I was sure the D stands for dick

Fucking Love this artist artwork. But It had a good mix between lust & vanilla. Pretty Good story overall
